programme.title: Kin: Matthew's Story - EP 6
programme.desc: Still shaken by the events of the night before, Matthew learns the shocking truth about someone he thought he knew. Matthew and Fiona find comfort with each other. Matthew realises he needs to protect those who are vulnerable. In doing so, he puts himself in grave danger.

programme.title: 15 Shorts - EP 9
programme.desc: 15 Shorts is a collaboration between the National Volunteer & Philanthropy Centre (NVPC) and Blue3Asia that will see 15 local filmmakers and online creators coming together to tell the stories of real Singaporeans. Told and interpreted in a diversity of styles, this series of films uncovers the stories of the people we were, spanning Singapore's history, from post-independence till the turn of the millennium.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 18 - EP 8
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: 亲 Kin - EP 197
programme.desc: A remorseful Zaryn finally makes an apology to Rosnani for all his misdeeds. Syirah shows up at Said Serves and embarrasses Rosnani in front of Chef Jenna. Hidayah surprises Zaryf with plans for a special date night.

programme.title: 健康与乐活 Body And Soul S7 - EP 4
programme.desc: (Encore) In this episode of Body & Soul, we explore a condition that affects many women. Some are not even aware that they have it. Some are not even aware of what it is. Join our celebrity guests as they share their personal experiences with ovarian cystectomy. Our specialist also shares with us the steps we can take to detect ovarian cysts in our body and what options are readily available to treat it.

programme.title: The Dr Oz Show 10 - EP 132
programme.desc: (Encore) Many popular vacation destination spots have become a haven for robbery, rape, and murder against unsuspecting Americans; how to stay safe on vacation; the world of child slavery; a woman is rescued after being enslaved by a U.S. family at age 10.

programme.title: The Flash S4 - EP 6
programme.desc: Barry trains Ralph to use his abilities, with Cisco making a stretchable suit for him. Another bus metahuman, a Lakota Sioux Native named Mina Chayton, who can animate statues, starts attacking Central City and stealing pieces of a Black Bison necklace, which she claims belongs to her tribe.

programme.title: The Brave - EP 9
programme.desc: After embarking on mission after mission to keep the world safe, the team is confronted with a task that hits close to home. When things go sideways, the only option is to risk one of their own for their final shot to settle the personal score.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 16 - EP 10
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Emmy Award nominee Issa Rae ("Insecure"), as well as, Cate Blanchett ("The House with a Clock in Its Walls").

programme.title: Justine's Flavors Of Fuji - EP 6
programme.desc: In an area filled with an extraordinary amount of tradition and culture, Justine meets local artisans and producers, visits amazing places and learns time-honoured cooking methods. Under the watchful eye of Fuji-san Justine will share dishes inspired by the journey and the produce that makes Shizuoka such a unique place... in such a unique country. Along the way Justine will learn the secrets to making soba noodles, Japanese sweets known as Wagashi and authentic soy sauce.

programme.title: Simply Nigella - EP 4
programme.desc: Simply Nigella brings us recipes that will be both a pleasure to cook and eat. Think light and uplifting soups, near instant stir-fries, one-pot wonders and plenty of baked treats. The pudding recipes in Simply Nigella offer both indulgent, full-fat splurges as well as ever-more popular dairy and gluten-free recipes, taking a reassuringly simple approach to dishes that often lead to stress in the kitchen.

programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be before hand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (重)“谁来晚餐" 是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 39
programme.desc: (R) Qitai wants Shiyan to move back to his house and also orders Jinghui to treat Shiyan with respect. Jinghui is dismayed with Qitai's sudden change of attitude towards her and decides not to tell Qitai that he can recover with a liver donation from a kin. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)奇泰要世妍搬回殷家住，还要京慧有礼貌地对待世妍。京慧不满奇泰如此对待她，于是决定不向奇泰透露他只要接受亲属捐肝就能痊愈的事，不让奇泰痊愈后跟世妍相认。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 40
programme.desc: (R) Jinghui attempts to take her own life when she cannot accept being thrown out of the house. Qitai takes pity on her and allows her to move back home. Jinghui contemplates donating part of her liver to Qitai so that he will treat her better out of gratitude. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)京慧无法接受自己被赶出家门，于是企图自杀。奇泰心疼京慧，让她回家休养，也要求英淑在旁照顾京慧。京慧想把肝捐给奇泰，让他因为感激她而不再把她赶走。.

programme.title: 创！ Start Up! - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Graffiti is officially launched to the public. However, those who downloaded the App, will have their personal information stolen. Sun Shao is unable to forgive Xuan when he found out that Xuan's father was the driver who killed his parents. Pepper found that mastermind to the sabotage is her mother! (PG)(重)Graffiti正式放到网上，不过凡是下载的人，他们的个人资料会被上载到网站上。孙少无法接受殷萱找他是为了弥补她父亲当年的罪过，伤心离去。Pepper跟踪Doobie，想要对峙时，却发现跟Doobie在一起的竟然是文欣。为什么文欣会被介入？.

programme.title: 一人行。暖人心 Going Miles, Spreading Smiles - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) After watching a documentary on the Payatas Slums, Kok Siong's heart was touched. He decided to start his first voluntary work in 2010, and did whatever he could to help the poor living at Payatas. (重)拥有40多年历史的柏雅塔斯垃圾山，面积相当于32个足球场，人口更多达30万人，其中百分之八十的居民，都在垃圾山工作，靠捡垃圾为生。2010年因为在网络上看了关于垃圾山的纪录片，而深深地被触动，义工林国雄开始了他的公益事业，每年定期到当地捐米助贫。在没有任何机构的赞助、没有资金的支持下，他自掏腰包，远赴垃圾山散播爱心。他不怕脏、不怕苦、不怕累，为的就是这群被边缘化的垃圾山贫民，以实际行动，温暖他们的心。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Yinghao bumps into Zhenshu in a restaurant. Zhenshu tries to find out more about her daughter from Yinghao, but Yinghao does not want to reveal much as he mistakes Zhenshu for abandoning the family years ago. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英鎬和真淑在一间餐厅碰面，真淑追问女儿的近况，英鎬以为真淑当年抛弃女儿，并且二十多年来没有找过女儿，不愿跟真淑多说。真淑满腹委屈。.

programme.title: 结婚契约 Marriage Contract - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Zhixun brings Huixiu and Enxing to his hometown to visit Meilan and fulfils his mother's wish to have a family photo. Zhixun and Huixiu rekindle their love after having fun running on the beach. That night, Zhixun receives a phone call from Nayun. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)治勋带慧秀和恩星回乡探望美兰，并拍了一张全家福照；完成妈妈的愿望。治勋与慧秀在沙滩上赛跑，两人的感情再次燃起。晚上，治勋却接到娜允突然来电。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 41
programme.desc: Jinghui reveals Shiyan's real identity to Zaijun on the morning of the engagement ceremony. She wants Zaijun to continue with the ceremony and torture Shiyan in the days to come. Zaijun misses the ceremony when he does not know how to handle the situation. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)京慧在定情仪式当天早上告诉宰俊世妍是奇泰的亲孙女。京慧要宰俊照计划举行定情仪式，然后慢慢地折磨世妍。宰俊不知道如何处理这突如其来的消息，最后决定不出席定情仪式。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 42
programme.desc: Qitai's survival rate is low even if Jinghui were to donate part of her liver to him as Jinghui is not biologically-related to Qitai. Realising that Qitai's situation is critical, Yingshu finally tells Shiyan about her relationship with Qitai and urges her to save Qitai. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)英淑从医生那里听说就算京慧要捐肝给奇泰，但因为京慧跟奇泰没有血缘关系，所以奇泰的存活率不高。英淑见奇泰的情况越来越严重，终于告诉世妍她真正的身份，并要世妍救奇泰。.

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 11
programme.desc: In this episode, Alberto will travel to Nuuk, the capital of Greenland, to explore the culture and art of the island. However, his travel plan may be thwarted by the challenging weather. 走过万年冰盖、白雪覆盖的康克鲁斯瓦格镇和伊卢利萨特镇，《极境之旅》极地探险的下一站，主持人葛凡将前进格陵兰的首府—努克，展开他在格陵兰的文化和艺术探索之旅；然而遇上格陵兰的多变天气，他能否顺利启程呢？.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 6
programme.desc: Ling Xiong acknowledges Gao Zijie as her son. She got involved with the underworld not by choice, but by chance. When her husband was killed by the Mob, Ling Xiong decided to send Zijie away to live with Auntie Wei in Taiwan. Unfortunately, this arrangement did not prevent Wei from being killed. (PG13-暴力镜头)令熊透露，她是高子杰的生母。她加入黑道非出于自愿，而是为环境所逼。当其夫遭暴徒杀害后，令熊决定将子杰送往台湾让薇姨照顾。不幸的是，虽然有此安排，薇姨还是惨遭杀害。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 上食堂2 Food Notes 2 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) Durian, the king of fruits, and smelly tofu, a specialty snack, often scare away foreigners with their smell. Yet they continue to enjoy a strong following year after year. What other foods in the world give out a horrible smell, but are must-haves in festivals and souvenir shopping for the locals? (重)榴莲是水果之王；臭豆腐是特色小吃；然而这些臭名远播的食物，即使被人嫌弃，却仍然受到一批支持者的力捧而历久不衰。世界各地还有哪些遗“臭”万年的食物，让人“闻”之丧胆，却也是当地人庆典的必备、送礼的首选？.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 传说中的料理2 Legendary Cuisines 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Do you know that Genghis Khan must have grilled skewered mutton before he leaves for the battlefield? Or how is the Dowager Chrysanthemum Hot Pot related to Empress Cixi? The new season of Legendary Cuisines has the answers. (重).

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai works as a substitute driver for Xiuzhe and his friends. Xiuzhen tries to incite Xiantai to drive dangerously and even tries to take over the wheels. Xiantai tries to teach Xiuzhe a lesson for endangering everyone's lives and ends up in a police station instead. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰担任秀哲及友人的代理驾驶。秀哲贪刺激，频频怂恿秀哲危险驾驶，还突然转动方向盘。贤泰觉得秀哲拿人命开玩笑，出手推秀哲，双方闹上警局。.

programme.title: 结婚契约 Marriage Contract - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Zhixun realises Huixiu has developed feelings for him when she kissed him after Zhixun asked for a breakup. Zhixun is at a loss after his father cancels his credit cards. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)治勋向慧秀提出分手，慧秀却突然吻治勋；治勋这才明白慧秀对他的情意。此时，治勋的信用卡被父亲取消，治勋一时无可适从。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 43
programme.desc: Shiyan wants to seek revenge against Jinghui for causing Qitai's death. Zaijun shares that he has been plotting a revenge against Qitai and his heir, but he will abandon his plans now. Zaijun hopes Shiyan can leave the country with him, but Shiyan initiates a breakup instead. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)世妍觉得京慧间接害死奇泰，于是要向她报复。宰俊向世妍坦白他长期的报复对象是奇泰和他的骨肉，但知道世妍是奇泰的亲孙女后却没有办法继续执行他的报复计划。宰俊希望世妍跟他远走高飞，世妍却向宰俊提出分手。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 44
programme.desc: Xiaojing keeps Minghuan's recovery a secret from the hospital and everyone else for fear that Jinghui will do harm to Minghuan if she knows that he has regained consciousness. Xiaojing plans to help Minghuan escape once he is strong enough to do so. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)孝静担心京慧一旦知道明焕已经苏醒了，就会对他不利，于是向医院和所有人隐瞒明焕的情况，并偷偷为他喂食，计划待明焕有体力后，带他逃出医院。.

programme.title: 边缘老人 Twilight Years - EP 6
programme.desc: In the past, Lepers were isolated in remote areas in order to control the spread of the disease. But leprosy today is no longer an incurable disease. In Vietnam's Thai Binh, some 100 lepers who have now recovered, still remain isolated from society. What is the impact of the stigma on their life? 越南：麻风村为了控制麻风病的传播，早期越南的麻风病患者都被隔离在越南各偏远地区。如今，麻风病已不再是绝症，这些麻风病痊愈者却仍然无法重返社会。因为社会舆论，有些麻风病痊愈者被迫与世隔绝超过50年。究竟社会舆论带给病愈的老人怎样的影响？.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 7
programme.desc: Dai Hua Guan's father is missing. Gao Zijie and Ruan Qingxin suspect that he has been kidnapped and imprisoned in a container parking lot. On another hand, Kent and Kate discover that Chen Wan Hui is using the place to hide stolen cash and other valuables. (PG13-暴力镜头)戴华冠的父亲离奇失踪，高子杰与阮清欣怀疑他是遭人绑架，然后囚禁在那个堆满货柜箱的营地里。另一方面，令千佑和韦以柔发现，陈万辉利用那秘密营地，以藏匿见不得光的现金和值钱的赃物。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 金装律师 Suits - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Heyan is impressed by Kangshuo's handling of the Noxi Chemicals case and she reveals the secret behind Yumi Pharmaceutical. Yanyu asks Shixi to be the client of the mock trial. Zhina feels jealous when the two practice in the company. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)荷妍赞赏康硕对于洛施化工的处理能力，也说出了悠美制药背后的秘密。延宇找世熙做模拟法庭的委托人，两人正在公司练习，让智娜醋意弥漫。.

programme.title: 我也可以是韩星 Miss Korea - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) In the new season of Miss Korea, 2 young ladies from totally different cultures and background (one Chinese who lives in Australia & the other Singaporean) will leave the comfort of their homes and embark on a 3 months journey to fulfil a K-Pop dream in Korea... (重)两个来自完全不同文化和生活背景的女生Julia和Jojo为了完成她们的韩星梦,远赴韩国进行3个月的造星训练。在人生地不熟的环境下,两个女生可否能和睦共处? 他们会实现梦想吗? 敬请期待!

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Xiantai is reprimanded by his supervisor when he leaves the workplace without prior approval. Xiantai is ordered to complete stock-taking on his own. Zaiyong is jealous and furious when he sees Xiuqing and Xiantai having supper together happily. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)贤泰因为擅自离开工作岗位而被上司臭骂一顿，然后被罚独自一人完成点货的工作。秀卿送夜宵给贤泰，两人边吃边说笑的情景被载永看到，载永愤怒不已。.

programme.title: 结婚契约 Marriage Contract - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) After finding out that she has only 30% chance of surviving, Huixiu starts to distance herself from Zhixun. To make Zhixun give up on her, Huixiu decides to accept Chengguo's money and divorce Zhixun. That night Zhixun makes a formal proposal to Huixiu, but she coldly rejects him. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)慧秀得知自己的病只有30%存活率，只好忍心与治勋保持距离。让治勋死心，慧秀决定向成国收取余款后和治勋离婚。那晚，治勋向慧秀正式求婚，慧秀冷漠地拒绝。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 45
programme.desc: Shiyan finds Xiulan successfully and brings her home. Not long later, Xiulan discovers that Yingshu has lied to her on purpose 30 years ago, causing her to lose her mind and also to miss out on family warmth. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)世妍终于找到被京慧藏起来的秀兰。两人相认后，世妍便把秀兰带回家。不久后，秀兰发现英淑当年故意撒谎骗她女儿在车祸中丧命，害她发疯，还导致她在过去的30年的岁月中，无法跟女儿相处。秀兰对英淑恨之入骨。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 46
programme.desc: Minghuan makes a full recovery and appears at the company as the new chairman. Xiaojing attempts to take her own life when she thinks that Minghuan would not have survived the operation. She is relieved and ecstatic when Minghuan appears before her. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明焕手术成功，但京慧却一直不知情。明焕突然出现在公司，还被理事们推举为新任会长，令京慧和世妍都很震惊。孝静以为明焕死了，本来想轻生，后看到明焕安然无事地站在她面前，激动万分。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 3

(PG)(重)五年前，与凯翔分手的Kloudiia，沿途在表姐Jessica的咖啡馆短暂停留。Jessica无意间发现发现Kloudiia怀孕了，而孩子就是凯翔的。后来Kloudiia不告而别，而Jessica也和她断了联系。眼前，她不知道Kloudiia和孩子身在何处。得知自己升为人父的凯翔，感到万分震惊。而这个突如其来结果，也让筱琦惊觉自己才是凯翔和Kloudiia之间的第三者。她开始质疑自己陪伴凯翔踏上这趟旅程的目的，是不是一步一步地将凯翔送回Kloudiia的身边。在痛苦和压抑中无处释放的筱琦，选择一个人离开。凯翔和Kenneth在焦急中四处寻找，期间，凯翔从Kenneth口中得悉自己和筱琦的过往。凯翔感到对筱琦无限的亏欠与愧疚…….

(重)越南：麻风村为了控制麻风病的传播，早期越南的麻风病患者都被隔离在越南各偏远地区。如今，麻风病已不再是绝症，这些麻风病痊愈者却仍然无法重返社会。因为社会舆论，有些麻风病痊愈者被迫与世隔绝超过50年。究竟社会舆论带给病愈的老人怎样的影响？.

programme.title: 小当家 Little Maestros - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) A child should enjoy his weekends, free of care. But for Luo Guangzhi, a 13-year-old boy in Guizhou, China, his weekends are spent caring for his paralysed mother, a responsibility that he has shouldered from the age of 7. Despite the obvious toil, he never fails to head back home for the weekend. (重)母亲工作受伤瘫痪在床，从此改变了罗光志的生活。原本懵懂好玩的小男生，7岁开始便要学习照顾母亲。因为课业关系，他一个星期只能在家两天。每逢星期五一放学他就直奔家里，代替出外工作的父亲照顾母亲。.

programme.title: 金星火星大不同 Mars Vs Venus - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Is men the weaker gender in a relationship? Due to societal pressures, men often hide their emotions and portray a masculine image. It is often said that breakups hurt women more in the short term but men never fully recover. Let's listen to what the guests have to say about this! (重)男人在感情世界里是弱者？碍于世俗眼光，他们必须隐藏内心的想法，不能宣泄被女人甩后的痛楚! 看郑斌辉和黄嫊方展开唇枪舌剑捍卫自己的观点！此外，嘉宾们也会分享分手的技巧和分手时的遣词用字。千万不要错过！.

programme.desc: (R) Zaiyong finds out that Xiantai is working as a substitute driver outside work. He purposely orders Xiantai to quit his part-time job so as to make things difficult for Xiantai. programme.title: 結婚契約 Marriage Contract - EP 15

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 47
programme.desc: Xiaojing befriends Xiulan on purpose with the aim of using Xiulan to deal with Jinghui and Yingshu. Xiaojing tells Xiulan that not only has Jinghui bullied Shiyan, she has also tried to accuse Shiyan of being mentally unwell so that Jinghui can take over the company. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)孝静计划利用秀兰对付京慧和英淑。她故意接近秀兰跟她说京慧不但羞辱和践踏世妍，还为了霸占财产，企图把世妍变成精神病患者。.

programme.title: 人偶之家 Mysterious Personal Shopper - EP 48
programme.desc: Shiyan produces the recording of the conversation between Qitai and Zhexiu 30 years ago to prove that Qitai is not behind the factory pollution. Thereafter, Shiyan tells the victims' family members that Minghuan and Xiaojing have covered up the truth on purpose to lay their hands on the company. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)世妍播放奇泰30年前跟金基哲的对话内容，向受害者家属证奇泰当年并非为了利益而故意让工厂排放毒气的。接着，世妍指明焕跟金基哲的女儿金孝静不但有奸情，还因为想霸占公司所以故意掩盖真相。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 6
programme.desc: The pair eventually finds Xiao Qi in Shaman Cape and Kai Xiang and Xiao Qi tearfully embrace. After going through so much, Kai Xiang opens up to Xiao Qi and the two share a moment. On arriving in Irkutsk, the trio checks into a hotel that Kai Xiang and Xiao Qi had visited five years ago. Kai Xiang starts to regain some of his memories with Xiao Qi and they head to a restaurant to celebrate, but Kenneth soon finds a peculiar photograph hanging on the wall. (PG)凯翔和Kenneth最终在萨满海角找到筱琦，二人相拥而泣。在经历了种种反思和回忆之后，凯翔也与筱琦打开心房，更加了解彼此的心意。但在旁边陪伴的Kenneth却心情复杂。在伊尔库茨克，三人来到五年前，凯翔与筱琦曾经下榻过的酒店。途中，凯翔不由自主地泛起种种来自过去的幻觉：Kloudiia的身影，孩子的脚步……过去的记忆碎片正如潮水般涌来，甚至连同与筱琦的记忆一起浮现。那一刻，当凯翔激动地告诉筱琦，他终于第一次记起她的时候，筱琦感到万分的感动。三人于是前往凯翔和筱琦五年前去过的餐厅庆祝。Kenneth无意间被餐厅墙上的一张照片吸引住了目光。.

programme.title: 混口饭吃而已 Hear My Thoughts - EP 6
programme.desc: Familiar real-life scenarios with hilarious caricature, Hear My Thoughts brings to attention the bottled-up sentiments of people at their workplace. 幽默短片《混口饭吃而已》，以逗趣的方式叙述各行各业的酸甜苦辣！打工仔的内心喊话及苦衷——只有自己最清楚，真相也绝非你所能想象！演员阵容包括：田铭耀、鐘琴、王智荟、胡佳嬑、坤华、罗翊绮及林茜茜，还有客串嘉宾周崇庆、权怡凤、朱厚任等。.

programme.title: 同盟 The Unholy Alliance - EP 9
programme.desc: Ignoring Ling Xiong's advice not to act on his own, Ricky unwittingly walks into a deadly trap when he traces Chen Wan Hui to his hideout and attempts to capture him. Meantime, Kent and Kate arrive at her family's seaside bungalow to look for the missing loot. (PG13-暴力镜头)令熊警告其家人，千万不可轻举妄动。但令家就不听劝告，独自跟踪陈万辉至其藏匿处，准备单枪匹马将他手到擒来。谁知这是陈万辉布下的陷阱，令家就马上就有性命之危。另一方面，令千佑与韦以柔为了追查赃物的下落，结伴来到了韦家的海边别墅。.

programme.desc: Gradually, Aira begins to feel that she has fallen for Jemy. Unknowingly, Jemy too is in love with her but both are not sure and do not dare to express their feeling to each other. They just want to keep to themselves and see who will make the first move.

programme.title: Jihan Show - EP 6
programme.desc: Jihan Show is a brand new series featuring Malaysia's famous comedian, Jihan Muse. Featuring Amy Mastura, Zara Zya, Syuk and her weekly guest artistes, the Jihan Show promises to be full of fun and laughter as the group casually discuss on current issues and the battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Jom Kahwin - EP 8
programme.desc: Adam, the eldest of four children, runs a farm in a kampung while simultaneously fending for his brothers who have all left school to help out on the farm. Having grown up with the animals, these three young men, Chad, Baim and Daniel, aren't the most well-mannered. To switch things up and bring change to the farm, Adam decides to venture into the city and scout for a potential bride who can also serve as an 'elder sister' for his brothers and become the 'ideal' housewife, whatever the latter means.

programme.title: Hentam Sajalah - EP 4
programme.desc: In this episode, Bahan and Wek Wek go all out as they bid for a chance to compete against the Sepak Takraw national athletes. With the players nose-diving to the goalposts and tripping on the court, join us on this game action Hentam Sajalah style!

programme.title: Hero Seorang Cinderella - EP 11
programme.desc: Nura Medina lives with her stepmother, Datin Mawar and her stepsister, Puteri after her father, Datuk Azizan, remarries. Her relationship with her father becomes distant when her stepmother consistently directs her hatred towards her every day. Datin Mawar secretly conspires with Puteri to destroy Medina and get rid of her.

programme.title: Andainya Takdir 2 - EP 18
programme.desc: Normah confronts Lin's ex-boyfriend and scolds him in the public for rejecting her. This causes him to feel humiliated and plans to seek to revenge against her. Hafiz suggests that Fatihah provides sexual harassment as a reason for early termination from her contract so that she can get away from Nizam. Mukhsin took a photo of Airil and Sofea together in front of Airil's house and sends the photo to Fatihah.

programme.title: Kawanku...Oh Yeah! 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Hakimi has a pimple outbreak on his first day of secondary and is too embarrassed to go. Time is running out and Dahlia is still trying to convince Hakimi to go to school. Azean is envious that Dahlia is now driving and has her own online business.

programme.title: Girls Only - EP 7
programme.desc: Join Ain Edruce as she educates you about make-up, fashion and beauty tips and more in the many different segments of Girls Only.

programme.title: Aziz Istanbul - EP 11
programme.desc: Glorious Istanbul shows Istanbul in all its glory from its oldest streets, alleyways to soaring minarets, thousands of hours of shooting speaks volumes about the historical capital city that is the Glorious Istanbul. The series will feature 26 interesting places in Istanbul, Turkey.

programme.title: Baik Punya - EP 7
programme.desc: Perlis is the smallest state in Malaysia and is situated in the northwest of the Peninsular. Join Nabil as he explores the most famous cave called Gua Kelam (Cave of Darkness) for an enchanting 'cave walk' where you can enter from one end of the cave and come out at a different location.

programme.title: Berita - EP 119
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: J.K.K 4 - EP 2
programme.desc: The new season of J.K.K is more hilarious than ever! Residents of Kampung Kalut frequently hold meetings about their problems with the Village Headman and Village council no matter how silly their problem is. A special guest will be invited every week to join in on these funny skits! Featuring guest artiste Dzawin.

programme.title: Solo Yolo - EP 2
programme.desc: Istanbul is one of the greatest and most fascinating cities in the world. Join actor Zahiril Adzim as he explores the Grand Bazaar of Istanbul which is the biggest old covered bazaar in the world with around 3000 shops within it. Follow him as he visits the busiest street in Istanbul, Istiklal Street, which is comparable to Fifth Avenue or Oxford Street.

programme.title: Andainya Takdir 2 - EP 19
programme.desc: Nizam's wife forbids him from going to KL. Airil continues to be by Fatihah's side when she is warded although she does not want him to visit her. Normah gets a shocked when she comes home to find Lin and her boyfriend together. Meanwhile, Airil meets with Puan Rogayah to ends Fatihah's services. Liza tells Fatihah what Airil has done to her and she should forgive him.

programme.title: Travelog Bikers - EP 13
programme.desc: In this last episode, Ahfad tries to get to the bottom of the history behind the legend Hang Tuah who was once a fearless warrior in Malacca. He was supposedly the most powerful of all the laksamana, or admirals, and is considered by the Malays to be one of history's greatest silat masters.

programme.title: Rahsia Singapura 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: Rahsia Singapura is an investigative-style travelogue, where our roving detective host digs for clues and snoops for hush-hush places and people here.

programme.title: Berita - EP 119
programme.desc: Catch the latest local and international news on Suria.

programme.title: Biar Aku Jadi Penunggu - EP 7
programme.desc: This a sad love story between Iffat and Afeef who were childhood friends. Iffat loves Afeef so much that she waited patiently for his return. After 3 years, Afeef came back but with a child. Then there's Rafaal who has long keep his feelings for Iffat but his hopes is buried with the presence of Afeef. Afeef strives to regain Iffat's trust. The fact that she has waited for him was enough to indicate that the women loved him whole heartedly.

programme.title: Andainya Takdir 2 - EP 19
programme.desc: Airil, who had been divorced from Fatihah, sought to reunite their families, including undergoing treatment with a doctor. Airil still did not give up on Fatihah to reconcile even after three months of divorce. He felt his life is not perfect without Fatihah and Aleeya on the side.

programme.title: Skuad Cilik 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: In season 1 of Skuad Cilik, three cheeky kids proved that they could host their very own talk show, as they welcomed guests from all walks of life for unprredictable, one-on-one interviews.Season 2, we build on the strengths of the debut season adding new and refreshed segments to give audiences more funny interviews, exciting activities and other surprises in a fast-paced weekly episodes.

programme.title: Makan Xtrim - EP 8
programme.desc: Makan Xtrim.

programme.title: Isteri Untuk Diiktiraf - EP 19
programme.desc: After the death of her parents in an accident, Saffiya was raised by her grandfather Tok Aki. She loves her grandfather dearly and wants to care for him for the rest of her life. But Tok Aki sees things differently. He wants Saffiya to get married before he dies. Saffiya disagrees with Tok Aki's view as she has no intention of getting married.

programme.title: Swap Kerja 3 - EP 5
programme.desc: Boat making is a long-forgotten tradition in Singapore. But in other parts of the world it is still commonly practiced. Let's see how Fawzi, a boat making aficionado performs as he builds his own boat and even competes with the locals in Terengganu, Malaysia.

programme.title: Abang Lori Ohsem - EP 8
programme.desc: For Luqman, all his life he has always wanted to be a pilot. Never did he realise that one day, his ambition will take a drastic change when he becomes a lorry driver instead and his nickname "Abang Lori Ohsem".But his life take a turn when he meets a female pilot and falls for her.

programme.title: Kelab J - EP 12
programme.desc: Kelab J is facing yet another challenge, spun by Atiqas past. Kamariah is not able to accept her ex husbands present situation. Liyanas disappearance is making Halimah extremely worried.
